roleset.name: make louder or greater
roleset.note: AMPLIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'amplify' based on sentences in financial subcorpus; adjectival 'amplified' based on BOLT-4,5. Member of Vncls overstate-37.12, other_cos-45.4. (from amplify.01-v)
AMPLIFICATION-N NOTES: Corresponds with frame for amplify.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from amplification.01-n)
AMPLIFIED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from amplified.01-j)

example.name: transitive, passivized
example.text: Moreover, [the price volatility]-3 that *trace* is amplified *trace*-3 by program trading is undercutting efforts to woo individual investors back to an OTC market that sorely misses them.

example.name: amplify-v: with instrument
example.text: John amplified his voice with a rolled-up piece of newspaper.
example.arg: with a rolled-up piece of newspaper

example.name: amplified-j
example.text: GEM and GFS however are much less amplified with the cold shot going further east .
example.arg: with the cold shot going further east

example.name: amplification-n: All Args
example.text: Dr. Bridget's amplification of the heartbeat using the EKG machine allowed the patient to understand the issue.
